    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112469</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112469</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">What Time is it? 1</string>
            <string language="en">What Time is it? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welche Zeit ist es? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle heure est-il ? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que hora é ele? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quando è? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι ώρα είναι; 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuándo es? 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Click on the clocks and listen! In this exercise you learn how to say what time it is.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">Click on the clocks and listen! In this exercise you learn how to say what time it is. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">time</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klicken Sie an die Taktgeber und hören Sie! 
In dieser Übung erlernen Sie, wie man sagt, welche Zeit es ist.
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - 
wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cliquez sur les horloges et écoutez ! 
Dans cet exercice vous apprenez comment dire que quelle heure il
est. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - 
module 2 - combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estale sobre os pulsos de disparo e escute! 
Neste exercício você aprende como dizer que hora é. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - 
módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scatti sopra gli orologi ed ascolti! In 
questa esercitazione imparate come dire che quando è. Safir - 
inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτυπήστε στα ρολόγια και ακούστε! Σε αυτήν την 
άσκηση μαθαίνετε πώς να πείτε τι ώρα είναι. Safir - 
αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2
- πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Haga clic encendido los relojes y escuche! 
En este ejercicio usted aprende cómo decir que cuándo es. 
¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo
2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
